Package com.example.app.service.impl

Class ProjectServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.example.app.service.impl.ProjectServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProjectService
public class ProjectServiceImpl extends Object implements ProjectService
Implementation of the ProjectService interface. Provides functionality to manage housing projects including creating, updating, deleting, retrieving by various conditions, and assigning officers or updating flat counts.
See Also:

    • createProject

      public Project createProject(String projectName, Date applicationOpenDate, Date applicationCloseDate, String neighborhood, int managerId, boolean visibility, Integer officerLimit, Set<Integer> officers, Set<MaritalStatus> groups, Map<FlatType,Integer> flats) throws IOException
      Creates a new housing project.
      Specified by:
      createProject in interface ProjectService
      Parameters:
      projectName - name of the project
      applicationOpenDate - opening date for applications
      applicationCloseDate - closing date for applications
      neighborhood - project location
      managerId - manager ID
      visibility - public visibility flag
      officerLimit - maximum number of officers
      officers - assigned officer IDs
      groups - target marital status groups
      flats - available flat types and counts
      Returns:
      the saved Project object
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • updateProject

      public Project updateProject(int projectId, String projectName, Date applicationOpenDate, Date applicationCloseDate, String neighborhood, int managerId, boolean visibility, Set<MaritalStatus> groups, Map<FlatType,Integer> flats) throws IOException
      Updates an existing housing project.
      Specified by:
      updateProject in interface ProjectService
      Parameters:
      projectId - ID of the project to update
      projectName - new name
      applicationOpenDate - new open date
      applicationCloseDate - new close date
      neighborhood - new neighborhood
      managerId - manager ID
      visibility - visibility flag
      groups - marital groups
      flats - flat details
      Returns:
      the updated Project object
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs
      IllegalArgumentException - if the project is not found
